title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open a .java file and another resource in the IDE, the context menu does not have the Team entry.
EB: The context menu should have the Team entry when I open both a .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open a .java file in the IDE. 
2. Open another resource (e.g., a .txt file, an image, etc.) in the IDE. 
3. Right-click on the opened resource. 
4. Observe that the context menu does not have the Team entry.
